oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slug Damage and Control of Slugs in Horticultural Crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Speiser, Bernhard
Glen, David
Piggott, Simon
Ester, Albert
Davies, Keith
Castillejo, Jose
Coupland, James
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Slugs can cause severe damage in horticultural crops. Slug activity; slug damage and control strategies differ considerably between countries or regions in Europe. The brochure summarizes recent research on novel methods of slug control.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Speiser, Bernhard; Glen, David; Piggott, Simon; Ester, Albert; Davies, Keith; Castillejo, Jose and Coupland, James (2001) Slug Damage and Control of Slugs in Horticultural Crops. FiBL-Merkblatt. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL).
